name: Square Rave
description:
A high-score chasing musical action game that will test your reflexes to the extreme, as featured in the Best New Games section of the App Store!

"It's very fast paced, and very addictive" - Sky News Swipe

"Square Rave is an awesome little music-oriented puzzle game that smacks of games like Lumines, but with its own unique sense of gameplay" - 148Apps

"Square Rave is as satisfying as it is intuitive, and more addictive than both" - Pocket Gamer

"Square Rave is a twitch game with a great soundtrack... It can be stressful, but that good kind of stressful" - Touch Arcade

Square Rave is a high-score chasing action game, speeding around an ever-changing field of squares to find safety before the end of each bar of music!

The more blue squares you pass through the higher your score will climb, but be careful - the trail you leave behind will block your path. As the tempo rises, your skills and reflexes will be tested to the extreme!

It's quick to fail, but quick to restart too...

Features:
• Fast-paced, tempo-synced action.
• Finely tuned touch screen controls.
• Seven pulse-racing electronic music tracks ranging from 120 BPM to 240 BPM!
• Challenge friends to beat your scores with GameCenter leaderboards and features.
• Quick restart to scratch that "just one more go" itch.

Get the soundtrack: http://unusualcadence.bandcamp.com

Square Rave is optimised for iPhones, iPads and iPods running iOS 7 or higher.

Contains some flashing imagery [with options to adjust/disable].
